WRITING.TEXT: Idk if you'll find this valuable or not but if you're like me and love exploring, don't fast travel anywhere, walk the land and you'll have alot more fun
Not sure how long orcs live for but you could spin something like her own stronghold was ravaged by the explosion of the red mountain?

WRITING.TITLE: Skyrim Lore
WRITING.TEXT: Not sure how many people on here care about it but anyone got some cool skyrim or elder scrolls lore? There's plenty to go around
